original_text: ‘We built houses with bricks and they fell down. But we will build them again with strong stones. People have cut down our fig trees, but we will plant great cedar trees instead.’
korean_text: 벽돌이 무너졌으나 우리는 다듬은 돌로 쌓고 뽕나무들이 찍혔으나 우리는 백향목으로 그것을 대신하리라 하는도다

sentences.original_text: But we will build them again
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리는 그것들을 다시 지을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: People have cut down our fig trees
but we will plant great cedar trees
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리는 큰 백향목나무들을 심을 것입니다
